title: Schedule new message
description: Schedule a new message to be sent at a specific time.

options.name: interval
options.description: How often should message be resent

options.name: channel
options.description: Channel in which the message will be send. If not set, the message just won't be sent

options.name: start
options.description:
When the message should be sent.
Available formats: `hh:mm`, `dd/mm hh:mm`, `yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm`, `dd.mm.yyyy hh:mm`, `yyyy-mm-dd`, `dd.mm.yyyy`
